nodes.text: Alderaanian Security was a security organization that operated on Alderaan during the early years of the Galactic Empire.

One of their agents was sent to investigate Imperial activity in the Deep Core Security Zone. For transport back to Alderaan, the agent was frozen in carbonite on Empress Teta and sent to Sel Zonn Station. The Alderaanian Security agent Maya was sent to recover her frozen colleague, but was attacked on the space station by stormtroopers. However, a group of spacers were able to collect the frozen agent and deliver it to Alderaan.
